[[Image:Tintin and the Lake of Sharks.jpg|thumb|200px]]
'''''Tintin and the Lake of Sharks''''' (originally known as '''''Tintin et le Lac aux Requins''''') is a ''[[The Adventures of Tintin|Tintin]]'' [[animated film]], directed by [[Raymond LeBlanc]] ([[1972]]). It was not written by [[HergÃ©]], who supervised, but by the Belgian comics creator [[Greg (comics)|Greg]] (Michel Regnier), a friend of HergÃ©. It was later adapted into a comic book in which the illustrations were drawn to look like still images from the film.
'''''Tintin and the Lake of Sharks''''' (originally known as '''''Tintin et le Lac aux Requins''''') is a ''[[The Adventures of Tintin|Tintin]]'' [[animated film]], directed by [[Raymond LeBlanc]] ([[1972]]). It was not written by [[HergÃ©]], who supervised, but by the Belgian comics creator [[Greg (comics)|Greg]] (Michel Regnier), a friend of HergÃ©. It was later adapted into a comic book in which the illustrations were drawn to look like still images from the film.
